phenku or tadeepaar ne apni jhooth bolne kii aadat apane bhakton ko is tarah lagaai he ki ab unke jaise bhakt gita par haath rakh kar kasam kha sakate hai ki wo jab bhi bolenge jhooth hi bolenge or jhooth ke sivaay kuch bhi nahin bolenge.

aaj bahut hi dukh ke saath kah rahaa hoon ki mujhe aaj bihar main paidaa hone par shame mahasoos ho rahi he.yahaan kii vyavastha ne ek baar phir sabit kar diya aap mehnat karte karte mar jaaie

har din saamne aa rahi hai. halaat itane badtar hai ki saamaan dhone vaale trakon main mazdooron kii dhulaai ho rahi he. palaayan kar rahe zyaadaatar majdoor bihar, jharkhand, uttar pradesh or madhya pradesh ke rahane vaale hai. vahiin punjab or haryana se bhi majdoor paidal hi hajaaron kilometre kaa safar kar apane gharon ko laut ne
ghayal ho gaye the. pravasi majdoor mumbai se laut rahe the. disiem main pravasi majdoor savaar the.locdown ke bich haive par in dinon dard kaa antaheen silsilaa chal rahaa he. roji-roti ke sankat ke bich pravasi majdoor bhayanak halaaton main apane gharon ko laut rahe hai. mazdooron ke palaayan kii chaunkaane vaali tasviren
ho gaye hai. is bheeshan palaayan ke daur main desh main ab tak kai majdoor chalate-chalate road or train accident main maare ja chuke hai.bataa den ki kal uttar pradesh ke jalon main hi pravasi mazdooron se bhari DCM gaadi ko kisi agyaat vaahan ne takkar maar di thi. is haadase main do logon kii maut ho gai jabaki majdoor
ja rahaa he trakon main savaar majdoor dilli se gorakhpur ja rahe the.desh main corona sankat ke chalate march se locdown jari he. locdown kii vajah se desh main yatayaat sevaayen thap hai. jiske chalate pravasi mazdooron kii pareshaani din pratidin badhati ja rahi he. halaat se pareshaan majdoor ab palaayan karne ko majaboor

ab kya bolen aapako shriman aaj to kute kaa photo twit kar rahe hai. aap zaraa yaad karen apane mata ji or pita ji ke kaal khand ko us samay to kute bhi sarkari aspataal nahin jaataa tha. bihar kaa jo haal aapane kiya he usase ubarna bahut mushkil he.

nitish ji or susheel modi ji aap log dekh lijie yahi bihar kaa vikaas he bihar kaa swasthya mantralay kaa pole khulata hua najar aa rahaa he tejasvi ji aapse bihar ke yuvaaon ko zyada ummid he unki vishwaas par kaayam rahanaa aap kii pehali praathamikta honi chahie
ji bilkul sahi kaha he apane is mudde par sarkaar ko dhyaan dena chahie
ye he nayaa bihar, mast he sarkaar aspataal me kutta le rahaa corona kaa upachaar garibon kaa karte ho vyapaar phir bhi kehete ho bihar me he bahaar ab to shame se dub maro nitish sarkaar

matlab ki inkaa mukhya uddeshy garibon kii seva karnaa nahin balki raajnneeti karnaa he. jab aap garibon ko khilaane main sakasham he to sarkaar ke saath saath kaam karen or garibon kii har sambhav madad karen, or raajnneeti to sari umr kerani hi he baad main kar lenaa.

agar aapke pita shri ne vigat varsho me kuch kaary kiya hota to ye majdoor apane hi pradesh me kaary karte or unhen ye din naa dekhne padate.

sahi baat he. agar aap saal se satta main he to saal pehle kaa ronaa mat roie.aapane apane rajya ko pichley15 saal me kis laayak banaaya he usko janata ko bataaie . ronaa rone ke liye janata ne nitish kumaar evam susheel modi ko nahin laai thi. magar afsos he ki bihar aaj bhi pichhadaa hua he, susheel modi ji ke anusaar
mananeey susheel modi ji yah aapaki or aapaki bijepi sarkaar kii jimmedaari he kii bihar ko sabhi prakaar kii suvidhaayen evam suraksha pradan karaao. kyoki sarkaar aapaki or aapke bijepi kii he mananeey lalu prasad yadav ji kii nahin. isliye aap ronaa dhonaa band karo apni jimmedaari nibhaao.

ye koi jaruri nahi he ke aaj lalu ji satta hote tabhi ye sab mewa khate. agar lalu ji aaj baahar hote to jarur khate. lekin is jagah par aap bhi khilavaa sakate the. aap to bas kisi kone se twit kar ke nikal jate hai. aaj lalu ji kii kami ko aap ko puraa karnaa chahie tha. lekin afsos nahi ho sakaa. kripya dhyaan de.
